description: The latest chairman of the http://anidb.net/ch1554 [PLANT Supreme Council]. Durandal is a leading member of the moderate faction of the PLANT leadership, and he hopes to carry on the legacy of the late http://anidb.net/ch1686 [Siegel Clyne] and achieve reconciliation with the Naturals. But even as he seeks peace through diplomacy and negotiation, Durandal continues to develop and manufacture new weapons, and as the new conflict escalates he resorts to deceptive means to manipulate public opinion in the http://anidb.net/ch1571 [PLANTs].
name: Gilbert Durandal
